20110121020908.000|20110121020909.000|CC1|ISLE DE GOREE IS SAID TO BE A   
20110121020909.000|20110121020911.000|CC1|HAVEN OF TRANQUILITY AND A HUB

20110121020914.000|20110121020918.000|CC1|PAST.                           
20110121020918.000|20110121020919.000|CC1|GOREE ISLAND WAS A BUSY GOODS

20110121020921.000|20110121020923.000|CC1|AND 19th CENTURIES, AND THAT    
20110121020923.000|20110121020924.000|CC1|INCLUDED THE TRAFFICKING OF     
20110121020924.000|20110121020928.000|CC1|HUMANS--SLAVES.                 
20110121020928.000|20110121020930.000|CC1|I'M VISITING GOREE ISLAND'S     
20110121020930.000|20110121020931.000|CC1|MOST POPULAR ATTRACTION--THE    
20110121020931.000|20110121020934.000|CC1|MAISON DES ESCLAVES, OR HOUSE   
20110121020934.000|20110121020936.000|CC1|OF SLAVES.

20110121020939.000|20110121020940.000|CC1|>> IT'S CLAIMED BY THE CURATORS 
20110121020940.000|20110121020942.000|CC1|THAT THIS HOUSE WAS USED AS A   
20110121020942.000|20110121020945.000|CC1|KIND OF HOLDING PEN FOR 150-200

20110121020949.000|20110121020951.000|CC1|>> ...IN 1776.

20110121020953.000|20110121020958.000|CC1|YEARS FROM 1536 UNTIL 1848,

20110121021001.000|20110121021004.000|CC1|FROM ALL OVER THE WESTERN COAST.
20110121021004.000|20110121021005.000|CC1|[INDISTINCT] THE WESTERN COAST  
20110121021005.000|20110121021010.000|CC1|TO AMERI.                       
20110121021010.000|20110121021012.000|CC1|AND MOST OF THE TIME IN THIS    
20110121021012.000|20110121021013.000|CC1|SMALL HOUSE, ONE CAN FIND A BIG 
20110121021013.000|20110121021014.000|CC1|FAMILY, MOTHER, FATHER, AND THE 
20110121021014.000|20110121021017.000|CC1|CHILDREN LIVING SEPARATELY, BUT 
20110121021017.000|20110121021018.000|CC1|FOR GOING TO AMERICAS, IT WAS   
20110121021018.000|20110121021020.000|CC1|DEPENDING ON THE VALUE.         
20110121021020.000|20110121021021.000|CC1|FOR EXAMPLE, FATHER TO          
20110121021021.000|20110121021024.000|CC1|LOUISIANA, UNITED STATES,       
20110121021024.000|20110121021027.000|CC1|MOTHER FOR BRAZIL OR CUBA, AND  
20110121021027.000|20110121021029.000|CC1|THE CHILDREN FOR ISLE           
20110121021029.000|20110121021031.000|CC1|[INDISTINCT]                    
20110121021031.000|20110121021036.000|CC1|THE SEPARATION WAS TOTAL.       
20110121021036.000|20110121021038.000|CC1|AND ALSO FROM THE DOOR LEADING  
20110121021038.000|20110121021039.000|CC1|TO THE BOTTOM, IT IS A DOOR OF

20110121022128.000|20110121022130.000|CC1|SOME ISLAMIC CRITICS OF THE     
20110121022130.000|20110121022131.000|CC1|MURID SAY THAT AS A BRANCH OF   
20110121022131.000|20110121022133.000|CC1|ISLAM, IT IS TOO FOCUSED ON     
20110121022133.000|20110121022135.000|CC1|AMADU BAMBA, DISTRACTING        
20110121022135.000|20110121022136.000|CC1|FOLLOWERS FROM THE TEACHINGS OF 
20110121022136.000|20110121022138.000|CC1|THE PROPHET MUHAMMAD.           
20110121022138.000|20110121022140.000|CC1|YES. OK.                        
20110121022140.000|20110121022142.000|CC1|>> WE HAD TO CONTEXTUALIZE      
20110121022142.000|20110121022144.000|CC1|ISLAM HERE INTO OUR OWN CONTEXT 
20110121022144.000|20110121022148.000|CC1|BECAUSE PLACES ARE DIFFERENT.
